unnormalised: Meri naani, Amma, hamesha Ayurveda ki kasam khaati thi. Unhone kaha ki Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala mein panchakarma upchar ke baad unke jodo ka dard gayab ho gaya. Mujhe yaad hai ki unhone Onam sadhya ka aanand liya aur kaha ki masale unke pachan mein madad karte hain! Stress ke liye Abhyanga try karne ki soch rahi hoon; achhi baatein suni hain. Kisi aur ko bhi achhe anubhav hue hain, shayad Bangalore ke aas paas? 5000 rupaye ka budget, maximum.
normalised: Meri naani, Amma, hamesha Ayurveda ki kasam khaati thi. Unhone kaha ki Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala mein panchakarma upchar ke baad unke jodo ka dard gayab ho gaya. Mujhe yaad hai ki unhone Onam sadhya ka aanand liya aur kaha ki masale unke pachan mein madad karte hain! Stress ke liye Abhyanga try karne ki soch rahi hoon; achhi baatein suni hain. Kisi aur ko bhi achhe anubhav hue hain, shayad Bangalore ke aas paas? Paanch hazar rupaye ka budget, adhiktam.
